actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2208 of title 10, United States Code, relating to working capital funds of the Department of Defense, to authorize on a noninterference basis the sale of certain articles financed by such funds to United States corporations for use in developing products or in domestic or foreign contracts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Permits the sale of supplies or services from Department of Defense inventories financed through a Department working-capital fund on a noninterference basis to a U.S. manufacturer or developer for use in products to be used in a contract with a Federal agency or a friendly foreign government as well as in a contract for the Department.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2208 of title 10, United States Code, relating to working capital funds of the Department of Defense, to authorize on a noninterference basis the sale of certain articles financed by such funds to United States corporations for use in developing products or in domestic or foreign contracts, and for other purposes.
